To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RateOfChange _roc;
private TargetDownsideDeviation _tdd;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_roc = ROC(symbol, 1);
_tdd = (new TargetDownsideDeviation(period)).Of(_roc);

// In OnData()
if (_tdd.IsReady)
{
    var current = _tdd.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
tdd = TargetDownsideDeviation(period)
self.roc = self.ROC(symbol, 1)
self.tdd = IndicatorExtensions.Of(tdd, self.roc)

# In OnData()
if self.tdd.IsReady:
    current = self.tdd.Current.Value
